comments:
Take a list of *strings* and *colors* and place them next to each other, with text strings[i] being shown in colors[i].

Parameters ---------- x, y : float Text position in data coordinates. strings : list of str The strings to draw. colors : list of color The colors to use. orientation : {'horizontal', 'vertical'} ax : Axes, optional The Axes to draw into. If None, the current axes will be used. **kwargs All other keyword arguments are passed to plt.text(), so you can set the font size, family, etc.
